name: 猎人物语
description: 《Hunter Story》is a horizontal action game which Use 2D cartoon style. Players play legendary hunters in the game. As a hunter, you must collect equipment and hunting monsters to survive in the vast world.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series Storage: 550 MB available space Sound Card: any Additional Notes: 无
